tossup_question: 17) MATH  At x = 1 divided by 2  the graph of y = x ^3 is:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) increasing and concave up 
X) increasing and concave down 
Y) decreasing and concave up 
Z) decreasing and concave down
tossup_answer: ANSWER: X) INCREASING AND CONCAVE DOWN (Solution: at the indicated value the 1st derivative is positive (implying increasing) and the 2nd derivative is negative (implying concave down))
bonus_question: 17) MATH  The point (3, 2) is reflected across the graph of y = 6 and the resulting point is then reflected across the graph of y = x. What are the coordinates of the final point?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: (10, 3) (Solution: the 1st reflection  (3,10); 2nd reflection interchanges the x and y coordinates)
